titles.title: Targeted Employment Areas Improvement Act
A bill to continue job creation and the promotion of investment through improvements to targeted employment areas.
Targeted Employment Areas Improvement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Targeted Employment Areas Improvement Act
This bill amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase the number of fiscal year EB-5 (employment creation) visas for qualified immigrants who invest in a new commercial enterprise which, in addition to creating jobs in a targeted employment area, will invest the required capital in such area.
Designation of a high unemployment area as a targeted employment area shall be valid for renewable five-year periods.
